For 0 < b ≤ 90 minutes, explain the meaning of  ∫ 0 b R ( t )dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbm aapedapaqaa8qacaWGsbaal8aabaWdbiaaicdaa8aabaWdbiaadkga a0Gaey4kIipakmaabmaapaqaa8qacaWG0baacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaam izaiaadshaaaa@42A9@ in terms of fuel consumption for the plane.

Explain the meaning of  1 b ∫ 0 b R ( t )dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbm aalaaabaGaaGymaaqaaiaadkgaaaWaa8qma8aabaWdbiaadkfaaSWd aeaapeGaaGimaaWdaeaapeGaamOyaaqdcqGHRiI8aOWaaeWaa8aaba WdbiaadshaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacaWGKbGaamiDaaaa@445B@ in terms of fuel consumption for the plane. Indicate units of measure in both answers.

features.html: The rate of fuel consumption, in gallons per minute, recorded during an airplane flight is given by a twice-differentiable and strictly increasing function R of time t. The graph of R and a table of selected values of R(t), for the time interval 0 ≤ t ≤ 90 minutes, are shown above.
